bgameb.rollers module

Game dices and coins

class bgameb.rollers.BaseRoller(name: str = 'base_roller')[source]

Bases: DataClassJsonMixin

Base class to create the rolled or fliped object

Define name to identify later BaseRoller object by unique name. For example: ‘six_side_dice’

Example:
    dice = Dice(name='six_side_dice', sides=12)
name: str = 'base_roller'
roll() → int[source]

Roll or flip and return result

Raises

RollerSidesError – is not defined number of sides

Returns

result of roll

Return type

int

sides: Optional[int] = None
class bgameb.rollers.Coin(name: str = 'coin')[source]

Bases: BaseRoller

Create coin like a dice with two sides

name: str = 'coin'
class bgameb.rollers.Dice(name: str = 'dice', sides: int = 6)[source]

Bases: BaseRoller

Create dice

You can define number of sides for dice. Default 6

name: str = 'dice'
sides: int = 6
exception bgameb.rollers.RollerSidesError[source]

Bases: RuntimeError

Count of sides not defined for this rolled object

bgameb.shakers module

Game shakers - dice towers, bags and etc

exception bgameb.shakers.RollerDefineError[source]

Bases: AttributeError

Count of rollers not defined

class bgameb.shakers.Shaker(name: str = 'shaker')[source]

Bases: DataClassJsonMixin

Create shaker for roll dices or flip coins

add(roller: RollerCls, color: str = 'white', count: int = 1) → None[source]

Add roller to shaker

Parameters

  • roller (RollerCls) – roller class instance

  • color (str, optional) – color groupe. Defaults to ‘white’.

  • count (int, optional) – count of rollers copy. Defaults to 1.

Raises

RollerDefineError – counts not set or are different rollers with same names

last_roll: Dict[str, Dict[str, Tuple[int]]]
name: str = 'shaker'
remove(name: str, count: int, color: str) → None[source]

Remove any kind of roller copy from shaker by name and color

Parameters

  • name (str) – name of roller

  • count (int) – count of rollers to delete

  • color (str) – color froup of rollers

Raises

RollerDefineError – name, color not match or count of rollers not defined

remove_all() → None[source]

Remove all rollers from shaker

remove_all_by_color(color: str) → None[source]

Remove all rollers by color from shaker. If no any color is match, nothing happens.

Parameters

name (str) – name of roller

remove_all_by_name(name: str) → None[source]

Remove all rollers by roller name from shaker. If no any name is match, nothing happens.

Parameters

name (str) – name of roller

roll() → Dict[str, Dict[str, Tuple[int]]][source]

Roll all rollers with shaker and return results

Returns

result of roll

Return type

Dict[str, Dict[str, Tuple[int]]]

Example:
    {"white": {"six_dice": (5, 3, 2, 5)}}
rollers: Dict[str, Dict[str, Union[RollerCls, int]]]
